## ISignal type

Signals into the gesture responder system

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ISignal = 'DELAY' | 'RESPONDER_GRANT' | 'RESPONDER_RELEASE' | 'RESPONDER_TERMINATED' | 'ENTER_PRESS_RECT' | 'LEAVE_PRESS_RECT' | 'LONG_PRESS_DETECTED';
```
